titleStmt.title: His Majesties letter to the major, aldermen, sheriffes, and the rest of the Common-Councell of the citty of Bristoll
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Oxford the 29. day of May. 1643."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
